game_description: Welcome to Funky Fungus! In this game, you use your hands to move around! This game had a lot of effort put into it. So please if you could, leave us a good review!
review_1: Very Amazing In Release, everything looks sick I’m glad people enjoy my models ingame, great literally the second it released
review_4: ok, maybe my last review was a bit too harsh but it would be nice if y’all would fix the smooth camera
review_5: It released very quick and had some bugs and updates, but it was still very fun and I’m trusted for it
